title: Grindr Loses Nearly Half Its Workforce After Implementing Return-to-Office Policy
description: The dating app told employees last month they had to work from an office twice a week.

title: We Tested Six Expensive Men's Razors. One Stood Out.
description: Is it worth ditching your drugstore razor and splurging on a high-end model?

title: Can You Wear a Smartwatch Without Looking Hopelessly Dorky? 4 Rules
description: Fitness trackers are useful, but often unsightly. Here are some tips for sporting them smartly.

title: It's Finally Time to Add Some Smart Tech to Your Dumb Home
description: Smart lights, smart locks and smart thermostats are ready for prime time thanks to a new era of cooperation among the tech giants

title: Artificial Intelligence, Steam Closets, European Dryers: The Future of Laundry Has Finally Arrived
description: Though futuristic devices designed to fold clothes have yet to pan out, doing laundry has never been easier. A guide to the latest innovations.

title: You're Doing Laundry Wrong: 7 Tips to Help You Clean Clothes More Expertly
description: Please, for the sake of your duds, stop using fabric softener, and 6 other wardrobe-wreckers to avoid. Plus, laundry-care symbols rated—from readable to incomprehensible.
